svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-08-24T00:50:23.902Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/128.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="7FEUht6bC62NhiF7lR-x" version="24.4.0" type="device"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="urVk9uAma9lVnV4TVb1j"> <mxGraphModel dx="819" dy="445" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-4" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-2" target="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-2" value="Create transaction" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="40" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-3" value="Sign transaction" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="40" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-5" value="(or let your user sign)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="80" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-6" value="User pays to ChainPay contract" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="130" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.501;entryY=-0.074;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-3" target="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-8" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="280" y="200" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-9" value="Is recipient a contract?" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="170" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-11" value="Send token / BNB to set recipient" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="240" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-12" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;exitX=1;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-15" target="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-9"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="247" y="260" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="230" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-14" value="Yes" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="200" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-15" value="Send token / BNB to contract with bytes data" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="240" width="120" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-16" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;exitX=0;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-11"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="322" y="254" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="o-Jhd9Sp63d2kZ_Q_uGA-17" value="No" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="200" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
